DOC.brief_summary: Consuming guaraná vitamin mineral complex improve mental fatigue cognitive function rest ; guaraná also contain caffeine , reduce perceive exertion increase fat burn exercise . The purpose study test whether consume guaraná vitamin mineral product exercise influence affect ( mood ) , physical exertion fat burn exercise mental fatigue , cognitive performance affect post-exercise .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Consuming guaraná Vitamin/Mineral Complex Pre-exercise Affect , Exertion , Metabolism Cognition
DOC.criteria: Individuals must : Healthy Male Aged 18 35years Habitually active ( exercise least twice week ) Able run moderate pace 30 minute nonstop treadmill Individuals eligible take part study : history neurological psychiatric disease exclude anxiety depression current diagnosis depression anxiety history significant head trauma , metabolic , endocrine cardiac disorder smoke within last 3 month , high blood pressure > 140/90mmHg consume > 500 mg caffeine per day dietary source adverse reaction caffeine contain product ( i.e . tea , coffee , energy drink , cola , Pepsi ) currently take pharmaceutical habitual take dietary supplement within last 4 week ( define ≥3 consecutive day ≥4 day total per week ) current history drug alcohol abuse participate another clinical trial within 30 day prior screen condition may interfere ability perform assessment history hypersensitivity investigational product active inactive constituent food allergy intolerance
